passage.title: One thousand ducks
passage.paragraph: Some girls are making great noises in class. Their teacher say to them, "You are making so much noise in class. I think a girl is like five hundred ducks."

Very soon, a girl student comes and says, "One thousand ducks outside are asking for you, sir." Hearing this, the teacher is surprised and goes out to see What it is. He sees his wife and his daughter standing outside the classroom.
